languages.text: "Как и всегда, Лорд-капитан. За вами — в огонь и пламя. Я, видит Бог-Император, имел честь служить при двух Вольных Торговцах и пережить одну из них — со вторым, пожалуй, можно уже и сгинуть вдвоем, если до того дойдет". {n}Абеляр усмехается — несколько зло для обычного себя.{/n}

"As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как и всегда, Лорд-капитан. За вами — в огонь и пламя. Я, видит Бог-Император, имел честь служить при двух Вольных Торговцах и пережить одну из них — со вторым, пожалуй, можно уже и сгинуть вдвоем, если до того дойдет". {n}Абеляр усмехается — несколько зло для обычного себя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds too wicked for his usual self.{/n}

"As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds too wicked for his usual self.{/n}

If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}

If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}

"As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}

languages.text: “一如既往，舰长大人，我愿随您出生入死。神皇为证，我有幸在两位行商浪人手下效力，而其中一位离世的时候，我却活着。因此，就算我真的和另一位行商浪人一起倒下，那也没什么遗憾了。当然，事情未必真的会走到那一步。”{n}阿贝拉德的笑声听起来比平时更尖锐些。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “一如既往，舰长大人，我愿随您出生入死。神皇为证，我有幸在两位行商浪人手下效力，而其中一位离世的时候，我却活着。因此，就算我真的和另一位行商浪人一起倒下，那也没什么遗憾了。当然，事情未必真的会走到那一步。”{n}阿贝拉德的笑声听起来比平时更尖锐些。{/n}

languages.text: «Como siempre, Lord Capitán, l{mf|e|a} seguiré hasta los límites del universo y más allá. He tenido el honor de servir a dos Comerciantes Independientes y de sobrevivir a una; sabe el Dios Emperador que no sería ninguna vergüenza caer junto a{mf|l otro| la otra}. De darse el caso, naturalmente». {n}La risa de Abelard suena algo más aguda que de costumbre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Como siempre, Lord Capitán, l{mf|e|a} seguiré hasta los límites del universo y más allá. He tenido el honor de servir a dos Comerciantes Independientes y de sobrevivir a una; sabe el Dios Emperador que no sería ninguna vergüenza caer junto a{mf|l otro| la otra}. De darse el caso, naturalmente». {n}La risa de Abelard suena algo más aguda que de costumbre.{/n}

languages.text: 「常と変わらず、ロード・キャプテン、たとえ炎の中であろうともお供して、共に戻ってまいりましょう。神帝陛下が証人です。大変光栄なことに、我は2人の自由開拓者に仕え、内1人が生き延びました。ですからもう1人と共に敗北しようとも、恥などではありません。仮にそうなったとしても、自然の流れでございますから」{n}アベラルドの笑い声は、ほんの少しだけ、いつもより耳に響いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「常と変わらず、ロード・キャプテン、たとえ炎の中であろうともお供して、共に戻ってまいりましょう。神帝陛下が証人です。大変光栄なことに、我は2人の自由開拓者に仕え、内1人が生き延びました。ですからもう1人と共に敗北しようとも、恥などではありません。仮にそうなったとしても、自然の流れでございますから」{n}アベラルドの笑い声は、ほんの少しだけ、いつもより耳に響いた。{/n}

languages.text: "Wie immer, Lord Captain, würde ich Euch ins Feuer und zurück folgen. Der Gottimperator sei mein Zeuge, ich hatte die Ehre, unter zwei Freihändlern zu dienen und einen davon zu überleben, es wäre also keine Schande, gemeinsam mit dem anderen zu sterben. Falls es dazu kommt, versteht sich." {n}Abelards Lachen klingt etwas schärfer als gewöhnlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie immer, Lord Captain, würde ich Euch ins Feuer und zurück folgen. Der Gottimperator sei mein Zeuge, ich hatte die Ehre, unter zwei Freihändlern zu dienen und einen davon zu überleben, es wäre also keine Schande, gemeinsam mit dem anderen zu sterben. Falls es dazu kommt, versteht sich." {n}Abelards Lachen klingt etwas schärfer als gewöhnlich.{/n}

languages.text: « Comme toujours, Votre Seigneurie ; je vous accompagnerai jusqu'en enfer s'il le faut. L'Empereur-Dieu m'en est témoin, après avoir eu l'honneur de servir deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes} et survécu à la première, je ne vois pas de honte à périr aux côtés {mf|du second|de la seconde}. Si tant est que nous en arrivions là, bien sûr. » {n}Le rire d'Abélard semble un peu plus tranchant qu'à son habitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme toujours, Votre Seigneurie ; je vous accompagnerai jusqu'en enfer s'il le faut. L'Empereur-Dieu m'en est témoin, après avoir eu l'honneur de servir deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes} et survécu à la première, je ne vois pas de honte à périr aux côtés {mf|du second|de la seconde}. Si tant est que nous en arrivions là, bien sûr. » {n}Le rire d'Abélard semble un peu plus tranchant qu'à son habitude.{/n}

languages.text: "Her zaman olduğu gibi Lord Kaptan. Cayır cayır yanan bir yangının içine kadar dahi sizi takip ederim. Tanrı İmparator şahidimdir ki iki Hür Tacir'e hizmet etme onuruna eriştim, bir tanesinin ölümüne dek yanındaydım. İkincisinin yanında ölmekten zerre utanç duymam. Durum o raddeye gelirse elbette." {n}Abelard'ın gülüşü, kulağına her zamankinden biraz daha keskin geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As always, Lord Captain, I would follow you into fire and back. God-Emperor be my witness, I have had the honour of serving under two Rogue Traders and survived one, so there would be no shame in going down alongside the other. If it comes to that, naturally." {n}Abelard's chuckle sounds slightly sharper than usual.{/n}
